Poured 3k hours into this game on console + pc together. This game is such an amazing concept and could go so far, but i genuinely dont understand what the devs are thinking. Every update is riddled with bugs, and on some cases make the game, certain characters and perks unusable and unplayble. Many players like myself have been asking for QoL Updates and general game health updates, which the devs seem to ignore. They are literally killing their game, so many people have stopped playing the game due to the state and the issue with hackers and them targeting streamers (the fact that people make a living of this game pfff) I could go on about all the problems with the game, but at this point we're all trying to talk to a brick wall :/

Do not get this game. Unless you enjoy toxic players and an even more toxic community

Bom jogo, tem uma quantidade boa de killers e survivors, dá um medo no começo mas com o tempo acaba passando praticamente por completo. A partir do momento que você perde esse medo, se você não variar sua forma de jogar o jogo vai ficando meio enjoativo/repetitivo, não importando o lado que você joga.
As atualizações dão uma sobrevida pro jogo, acredito que se não houvesse essa adição de novos personagens o jogo poderia contar com bem menos jogadores do que tem hoje. Depois de jogar por um tempo agora costumo retornar quando saem essas atualizações ou quando dou uma enjoada de outros jogos, geralmente ele é uma boa alternativa.

7.5/10.

Where to even begin!
1, The community is toxic
2, The game is disgustingly competitive which doesn't make sense since it is like one game mode for $20 and all you get is the same experience but different only depending on the killer that you go against which gets tedious least moba's and other comp games learned to addon from that
3, The game play is not very satisfying and you don't move through loops very smoothly making it feel idiotic
4, The devs are idiots that do not know what they are doing I can't even tell you how many times I look at something and be like "huh this is really stupid and complex to fit into the game and doesn't fully make sense why did they go through all the trouble to add it to the game?" (like nurse)
5, The game play is based on whoever plays the scummiest wins so rip casual players, meta players ggez and instead of fixing this they just add $15 skins
6, This game has bugs and plenty more problems and it would be nice to see content go in a different direction but what do we get instead? these pay to win chapters which bring even more bugs
7, To really some up this game its like playing among us; public matchs are awful and usually aren't fair, solo queue is hell, but its really really fun if you play a private match party with friends but everything else is barely worth it and even than its pretty much who has more time and better perks from the chapters (tho even if they don't give you the killers in private match atleast they give you all the perks)
8, The devs are special snowflakes that need a safe space so don't bother you don't have a voice in this community its whatever the devs want
9, The game is a disgusting grind fest its stupid like hours of hours stupid grind for these dumb tiers you have to get through just to get the best version to a perk you won't use to finally get to the actual perk you want which you still have to tier up
10, The blood web is a garbage system like I can understand why they would do it so you get equipment as well as perks but its a slow boring clicky clicky process why haven't they updated this already!??!?!? this isn't 2016
11, The nerfs in this game are so bad like really really bad when they nerf a killer goodbye forever to that killer its rarely seen again when they nerf a perk same thing (i'm still wondering why they bothered buffing boil over if they were gonna nerf it to the ground like stupid devs much? now no one uses boil over wtf was the point)
12, Seriously you are still reading this and/or contemplating on buying this? please don't its really not that fun its like 5 hours of joy than gone and the learning curve is a nightmare to get around AND ITS $20 for this garbage please don't give these devs money go buy v bucks instead its a better investment!!!
13, kills = skills

Dead by Daylight is a survival horror asymmetric online game.

DBD has two teams, the Survivors and the Killer.
The Survivors consist of four survivors whose main goal is to fix five generators and open one of the two exit gates to escape.
The Killer must hunt down all four survivors and hit them twice, which will knock them to the ground, when the survivor is knocked it is possible for the Killer to pick them up and set them on a hook which is scattered across the map.

Each survivor and killer has different abilities which you must utilize to become the strongest DBD player!

Dead by Daylight in short is a game that tries to be competitive however, fails miserably, largely due to the disconnection between the game and the developers.

I am disappointed to see the game get to this state considering the amount of hours I have put into it, however I genuinely do not have any sort of enjoyment from the game, even when I win a match, as it was so damn stressful and that there is also zero reward for winning in the game.

The game is a filler game (A game you play when you don't know what else to play) if you want a game to play like that I recommend, however on a competitive standpoint I do not recommend as the game is horribly balanced.

The game's popularity is mainly through it's licenses and it's unique 1v4 play however more and more games are coming to light with similar game play, if not better.

I genuinely hope that VHS gives the game a solid competition so behaviour maybe hire more developers and sort out their spaghetti code of a game.

[Update]

I have a serious love/hate relationship with this game, and partially the reason for it is mainly due to the fact that the devs are wanting to do right. With the new anniversary stream showing off a lot of content that there is to come by reducing the grind etc...

Lets just say I have HIGHER hopes.

But I'm just generally a huge horror fan, so honestly this game is like a smash bros but Horror.
